pain-point.title: Onboarding Flow Cognitive Overload
pain-point.description: 4-step onboarding process with AI autonomy configuration may overwhelm new users
pain-point.impact: 12% drop-off rate per step, 32% total abandonment
pain-point.user-quote: "I wasn't sure what the AI autonomy slider really meant for my day-to-day use"

recommendations.rec: Add interactive examples for AI autonomy levels
Consider condensing to 3 steps with optional advanced settings
Provide "quick start" option for experienced users

pain-point.title: Content Generator Feature Overwhelm
pain-point.description: Multiple content optimization options can paralyze decision-making for beginners
pain-point.impact: 23% of users stick to basic features, missing advanced capabilities
pain-point.user-quote: "There are so many options I'm not sure which ones I should focus on"

recommendations.rec: Implement progressive disclosure for advanced features
Add guided mode for first-time content creation
Provide feature-specific onboarding tours

pain-point.title: Collaboration Features Hidden
pain-point.description: Real-time collaboration capabilities not easily discoverable by single users
pain-point.impact: 34% user adoption rate for collaboration features
pain-point.user-quote: "I didn't realize I could invite my team until week 3"

recommendations.rec: Add collaboration prompts in content creation flow
Include collaboration examples in onboarding

pain-point.title: Insufficient Error Recovery Guidance
pain-point.description: Users struggle to recover from errors, especially session timeouts during content creation
pain-point.impact: 37% of users experiencing errors abandon their session
pain-point.user-quote: "I lost 30 minutes of work when my session timed out"

recommendations.rec: Implement auto-save for all content creation
Provide clear recovery steps for common errors
Add better session timeout warnings

pain-point.title: Mobile Performance on Slow Networks
pain-point.description: Application load time excessive on 3G networks
pain-point.impact: 8.3 second load time leads to 28% mobile abandonment
pain-point.user-quote: "The app takes forever to load on my phone when I'm not on WiFi"

recommendations.rec: Implement aggressive mobile caching strategy
Add offline-first content creation capabilities
Optimize critical path rendering for mobile

pain-point.title: Viral Prediction Score Confusion
pain-point.description: Users don't understand what viral prediction scores mean or how to improve them
pain-point.user-quote: "I got a score of 73 but I don't know if that's good or how to make it better"

recommendations.rec: Add contextual explanations for prediction scores
Provide specific improvement suggestions
Include benchmarking against similar content
